structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Each eligible local government, the Kentucky Community and Technical College System, and the Department of Military Affairs shall submit reports to the commission on fire protection on June 30, September 30, December 31, and March 31 of each year containing information relative to number, rank, education, training and compensation of firefighters and fire and rescue training coordinators in their jurisdictions and the disposition made of any state or other funds received pursuant to KRS 95A.200 to 95A.300.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 373, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1980.
